channel.title: Comments on: You’re soaking in them

item.title: by: stephen ogrady
item.description: nor do i. martin's a good guy, and does a good job "getting" the stories he covers. when he called about this, i was only too happy too oblige ;)
item.content:encoded: nor do i. martin’s a good guy, and does a good job “getting” the stories he covers. when he called about this, i was only too happy too oblige ;)
